exceptions.tactic: intros a Ha Hz H1 Q p q H2 H3 r s H4 H5 H6 H7.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : Term A n H : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a H0 : eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a (T1 A1 n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p, q : list (Term A n) H1 : reduceplus Q p q H2 : canonical A0 eqA ltM p r, s : list (Term A n) H3 : canonical A0 eqA ltM r H4 : eqP A eqA n p (mults multA (n:=n) a r) H5 : eqP A eqA n q (mults multA (n:=n) a s) H6 : olist (A:=A) ltM p H7 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p H9 : T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a = M1 n The term "Rstar_0" has type "forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (x y : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n x y -> reduceplus Q x y" while it is expected to have type "list (poly A0 eqA ltM)".

original: intros a Ha Hz H1 Q p q H2 H3 r s H4 H5 H6 H7. inversion H2; subst. - auto. - inversion H0; subst. + apply (reduceplus Rstar_0). apply H11. +
